column1: * Will Whitfoot resigns as Mayor of Michel Delving. Samwise Gamgee is elected as Mayor for the first of seven terms..
* Aragorn issues and edict that Men are not to enter either Dr√∫adan Forest or the Shire. Elesssar makes the Shire a Free Land under the protection of the Northern Sceptre.
* Peregrin Took marries Diamond of Long Cleeve.

column2: fourth child and second son of Samwise Gamgee and Rose Cotton.
